p: CP is a safe and potentially effective strategy for the treatment of emerging and re-emerging pathogens, especially in those scenarios without proved antiviral agents or vaccines. IVIg and CP shared similar mechanisms of action. The potential antiviral and immunomodulatory effects of CP are currently evaluated in COVID-19. According to the physiopathology of COVID-19 severe patients should be privileged over critical ones in order to reduce mortality and improve outcomes.
